# Federal Reserve Economic Data #
[Federal Reserve Economic Data(FRED)](https://fred.stlouisfed.org/)

## Case-Shiller Home Price Index ##
[S&P/Case-Shiller NY-New York Home Price Index(FRED)](https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/NYXRSA)

[S&P/Case-Shiller CA-San Francisco Home Price Index(FRED)](https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/SFXRSA)

[S&P/Case-Shiller MA-Boston Home Price Index(FRED)](https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/BOXRSA)

[S&P/Case-Shiller 20-City Composite Home Price Index(FRED)](https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/SPCS20RSA)

## Metropolitan Population ##

[Resident Population in New York-Newark-Jersey City(FRED)](https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/NYTPOP)

[Resident Population in Boston-Cambridge-Newton(FRED)](https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/BOSPOP)

[Resident Population in San Francisco-Oakland-Hayward(FRED)](https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/SFCPOP)

## Income ##

[Real Median Household Income in Massachusetts(FRED)](https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/MEHOINUSMAA672N)

[Real Median Household Income in New York(FRED)](https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/MEHOINUSNYA672N)

[Real Median Household Income in California(FRED)](https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/MEHOINUSCAA672N)

[Real Median Household Income in the United States (FRED)](https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/MEHOINUSA672N)

## Supply Of Houses ##
[Monthly Supply of Houses in the United States(FRED)](https://fred.stlouisfed.org/series/MSACSR)
